title: About AORON
description: AORON is a manufacturing brand offering stylish, quality and competitive apparel for B2B partnerships. We have been operating since 1991 and specialize in creating men's and women's clothing, focused on wholesale, retail chains and custom orders for brands and boutiques.
directions: Prince - a classic line of men's suits, proven by time and quality
AORON - a modern brand with an expanded assortment: from casual wear to accessories and shoes
production_text: Our company started with a team of 4 people and today employs over 100 people. In the summer of 2025, we are launching a new factory with the ability to scale production - up to 500 employees and 5000+ units per month.
offer_list: Flexibility to work under private label
why_list: More than 30 years of experience in the market of Uzbekistan
Full cycle of production - from design to packaging
Ability to create collections for your brand
Modern models inspired by global trends
Favorable conditions for distributors, marketplaces and stores

mission_text: To create exceptional menswear that empowers men to look and feel their best, while maintaining a commitment to quality, sustainability, and ethical practices.

1.title: Fantastic final. Uzbekistan youth became Asian champions playing with 9 men.
1.description: April 20. Taif. King Fahd Stadium. Goals: Muhammad Hakimov (50', penalty), Sadriddin Hasanov (71'). Uzbekistan ‚Äî Ne‚Äômatulloh Rustamjonov, Muhammad Hakimov, and others...
1.content: On April 20, at King Fahd Stadium in Taif, Saudi Arabia, the final of the AFC U-17 Championship took place. Facing the host team, Uzbekistan showed great bravery and secured a confident victory. In the first half alone, Uzbekistan was reduced to 9 men: in the 39th minute, Nurbek Sarsenbayev struck an opponent with his foot and was sent off. The referee confirmed the red card decision after VAR review. Despite the setback, the Uzbek team triumphed heroically, with goals from Hakimov and Hasanov.

faq1.q: How do I find my size?
faq1.a: You can refer to our size guide which is available on each product page. If you're still unsure, feel free to contact our customer support team for assistance.

faq2.a: We offer a 30-day return policy for unworn items in their original packaging. Please visit our Returns & Exchanges page for more details.
